snippet: A 1975 Times Magazine article by John Hersey revealed that President Ford ate the same lunch every day: cottage cheese with A-1 Sauce and a sliced onion. The takeaway is clear: If food is important to you, consider a profession other than the...
abstract: A 1975 Times Magazine article by John Hersey revealed that President Ford ate the same lunch every day: cottage cheese with A-1 Sauce and a sliced onion. The takeaway is clear: If food is important to you, consider a profession other than the presidency.

headline.main: Another Reason You Might Not Want to Be President
